title: 1 - An Introduction to the Mutual Funds Marketplace

questions.question: What is the purpose of the fund facts?

options.a: To clarify for clients the nature and terms of their relationship with the dealer of the fund.
options.b: To provide clients with key fund information that is relevant to their investment decisions.
options.c: To better align the interests of the fund with the client.
options.d: To determine if a fiduciary duty is present in the representative-client relationship.
